name: YOURLSClient
author: Injabie3#1660
description: This cog allows you to manage a YOURLS instance on a per-guild basis.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the YOURLS client. Please run [p]yourls to see all the relevant commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores the API endpoint and signature in order to connect and authenticate to your YOURLS instance.
